page.title: 15Interview: a local resident
page.content:
Everyone in Upwood knows Mrs.Ivy Agger.She has been there for sixty years.She came from Ramsey Heights. She moved to Upwood to nurse Lady Sheperson's mother at Carlton House. After that she cooked for Lady Sheperson at Upwood Manor for over twenty years.She got married from Carlton House and then moved to 4 High St.When she moved there,there was a well in her garden.Where there are houses now there was a farm. The farmer used to fetch water using a yoke from Ivy's well.Mrs.Agger used to clean brasses for Upwood Church.She now writes for the church magazine and the Hunts Post every week.She also reads lessons in church.
by Kate and Joanne
